dataset_info.name: Legal Metrology Compliance Sample Dataset
dataset_info.description: Annotated sample dataset with compliant and non-compliant product examples for Legal Metrology compliance training and validation

fields.compliance_score: Score from 0-100 based on Legal Metrology rules
fields.extracted_text: OCR extracted text from product label
fields.violations: List of Legal Metrology violations found
fields.platform_source: E-commerce platform where product was found

samples.extracted_text:
Organic Basmati Rice
Net Wt: 1 kg
MRP: ₹299.00 (Incl. of all taxes)
Mfg: 15/08/2025
Exp: 15/08/2027
Manufactured by: ABC Organic Foods Pvt. Ltd.
Address: Plot No. 123, Industrial Area, Gurgaon, Haryana - 122001
FSSAI Lic. No: 12345678901234
Country of Origin: India
Customer Care: 1800-123-4567

annotated_fields.manufacturer_address: Plot No. 123, Industrial Area, Gurgaon, Haryana - 122001

samples.notes: Perfect compliance with all Legal Metrology requirements. Clear MRP display, complete manufacturer details, proper net quantity declaration.

samples.extracted_text:
Premium Tea Blend
Weight: 500gm
Price: Rs. 150/-
Packed by: Tea Company
Best Before: Dec 2025

violations.description: MRP not properly declared with ₹ symbol and 'MRP' text
Incomplete manufacturer address missing
Country of origin not declared
FSSAI license number missing for food product

samples.notes: Multiple violations including improper MRP declaration, incomplete manufacturer details, and missing FSSAI license.

samples.extracted_text:
Herbal Shampoo
Net Quantity: 200 ml
MRP: ₹245.00 (Inclusive of all taxes)
Mfd: 10/07/2025
Exp: 09/07/2028
Manufactured by: Beauty Care Industries Ltd.
Mfg Address: Unit 45, Phase-II, Baddi, Himachal Pradesh - 173205
Country of Origin: India
Marketed by: Beauty Care Industries Ltd.
Customer Care: customercare@beautycare.com, 1800-456-7890

samples.extracted_text:
Face Cream
50g
Price: 199
By: XYZ Cosmetics
Use before 2026

violations.description: MRP not declared with proper format, missing ₹ symbol and 'MRP' text
Complete manufacturer address not provided
Expiry date format is vague, should be DD/MM/YYYY
Country of origin not specified

samples.notes: Poor compliance with multiple critical violations in MRP declaration and manufacturer information.

samples.extracted_text:
Floor Cleaner
1 Liter
MRP Rs 89
Made by: ABC Ltd
Exp: 2026

violations.description: MRP format should include ₹ symbol consistently
Complete manufacturer address required
Manufacturing date not mentioned
Country of origin declaration missing

samples.notes: Moderate compliance issues primarily with manufacturer details and missing information.

samples.extracted_text:
Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
MRP: ₹2,499.00 (Inclusive of all taxes)
Manufactured by: TechSound Electronics Pvt. Ltd.
Address: B-12, Electronic City, Bangalore, Karnataka - 560100
Country of Origin: China
Imported by: TechSound Electronics Pvt. Ltd.
Customer Support: support@techsound.in, 1800-567-8901
Warranty: 1 Year
Model: TS-BT-450
samples.notes: Excellent compliance for imported electronics with proper importer details and country of origin.

violations.description: MRP not properly declared, missing ₹ symbol and 'MRP' text
Complete manufacturer/importer address missing
Country of origin mandatory for electronics, not declared
No mention of IS standards or certifications for electronic product

samples.notes: Severe non-compliance with minimal product information and multiple critical violations.

samples.extracted_text:
Cotton T-Shirt
Size: L
MRP: ₹899.00 (Incl. of all taxes)
Fabric: 100% Cotton
Manufactured by: Fashion Forward Apparel Pvt. Ltd.
Address: Plot 67, Garment Hub, Tirupur, Tamil Nadu - 641604
Country of Origin: India
Care Instructions: Machine wash cold, Do not bleach
Customer Care: care@fashionforward.com

annotated_fields.manufacturer_address: Plot 67, Garment Hub, Tirupur, Tamil Nadu - 641604
annotated_fields.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, Do not bleach

samples.notes: Good compliance for fashion product with proper fabric composition and care instructions.

samples.extracted_text:
Designer Shirt
Size: M
Price: Rs. 1200
Brand: StyleMax

violations.description: MRP not declared with proper format, should be 'MRP: ₹1200.00'
Complete manufacturer address not provided
Fabric composition not mentioned for textile product
Country of origin not specified

samples.notes: Poor compliance with missing essential information for fashion product.

characteristics: Clear MRP declaration with ₹ symbol and 'MRP' text
Proper net quantity declaration with units
Manufacturing and expiry dates in DD/MM/YYYY format
IS standards for electronics where applicable

common_violations: Lack of proper units for quantities

scoring_criteria.90-100: Excellent compliance with all mandatory requirements

validation_notes.manual_verification: All samples have been manually verified by Legal Metrology experts
validation_notes.cross_validation: Each sample reviewed by at least two annotators
validation_notes.quality_assurance: Random sample audits performed for accuracy
validation_notes.update_frequency: Dataset updated quarterly with new samples
validation_notes.usage_guidelines: This dataset is intended for training and validation purposes only
